Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

description.description: A short description of the entity's purpose

home_url.description: A web link that can send observers to the organization that the verifier belongs to

name.description: A short name describing the entity
